publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3563 Irene McGugan: Mouth Cancer Awareness Week-That the Parliament recognises that the second Mouth Cancer Awareness Week runs from 10-16 November 2002; congratulates the Tayside Community Dental Service and other agencies throughout Scotland for their efforts to inform the public about this disease; notes with concern that in Scotland there are approximately 500 new cases of oral cancer and 250 deaths per year, that less than 50% of cases will survive five years and that the incidence of oral cancer is on the increase in younger people, and encourages the Scottish Executive to assist in raising public awareness of preventative measures such as giving up smoking, reducing alcohol consumption and, most importantly, visiting a dentist at least once a year.
S1M-3563 Mouth Cancer Awareness Week (lodged on 11 November 2002) Alex Neil*
S1M-3563 Mouth Cancer Awareness Week (lodged on 11 November 2002) Mary Scanlon*, Christine Grahame*, Michael Matheson*

S1M-3563 Irene McGugan: Mouth Cancer Awareness Week-That the Parliament recognises that the second Mouth Cancer Awareness Week runs from 10-16 November 2002; congratulates the Tayside Community Dental Service and other agencies throughout Scotland for their efforts to inform the public about this disease; notes with concern that in Scotland there are approximately 500 new cases of oral cancer and 250 deaths per year, that less than 50% of cases will survive five years and that the incidence of oral cancer is on the increase in younger people, and encourages the Scottish Executive to assist in raising public awareness of preventative measures such as giving up smoking, reducing alcohol consumption and, most importantly, visiting a dentist at least once a year. Supported by: Alex Neil, Mary Scanlon, Christine Grahame, Michael Matheson
S1M-3563 Mouth Cancer Awareness Week (lodged on 11 November 2002) Donald Gorrie*
S1M-3563 Mouth Cancer Awareness Week (lodged on 11 November 2002) Mr Kenneth Gibson*
S1M-3563 Mouth Cancer Awareness Week (lodged on 11 November 2002) Nora Radcliffe*
S1M-3563 Mouth Cancer Awareness Week (lodged on 11 November 2002) Fergus Ewing*, Shona Robison*
S1M-3563 Mouth Cancer Awareness Week (lodged on 11 November 2002) Elaine Smith*
S1M-3563 Mouth Cancer Awareness Week (lodged on 11 November 2002) Ian Jenkins*
S1M-3563 Mouth Cancer Awareness Week (lodged on 11 November 2002) Mr Keith Raffan*
